title: Worklist Items
description: Task management list for flagged records requiring attention or review.

source_table.description: Name of the table where the flagged record belongs.

source_id.description: Primary key ID of the record in the source table.

display_label.description: Human-readable title or summary of the flagged item.

display_context.description: Additional context (e.g., period, category) to help identify the item.

added_at.description: Timestamp when the item was added to the worklist.

status.description: Current processing status of the worklist item.
